channel.title: Assignment :: CIS 527 Textbook
channel.description: Lab 2 - Configuration Management Instructions Create two different Puppet Manifest Files that meet the specifications below. Each one will be applied to a newly installed virtual machine of the appropriate operating system configured as described in Task 0. The best way to accomplish this is to treat this assignment like a checklist and check things off as you complete them. If you have any questions about these items or are unsure what they mean, please contact the instructor.
